User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; X11; Linux x86_64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111115183813

Steps to reproduce:

* Installed Open Web Apps ext for test day
* Installed two test apps from https://apps-preview-dev.allizom.org/en-US/apps/ ("MARBLE RUN", "Rainbooth")
* Installed two test apps from https://apps.mozillalabs.com/appdir/ ("Sketch" and "Z-Type")




Actual results:

"Sketch" and "Z-Type" do not display in the list of applications at https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ -- however they are listed as installed at https://apps.mozillalabs.com/appdir/

Screenshot attached showing one of the apps listed as "Installed!" but missing. Reloading either page has no effect.


Expected results:

If installed, they should show up at https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ so they can be launched.

After restarting Firefox, the two apps from apps.mozillalabs.com are now the *only* apps appearing at https://myapps.mozillalabs.com/ -- the apps from apps-preview-dev.allizom.org are now missing.

However at about:apps, I still see only the apps from apps-preview-dev.allizom.org, and neither of the apps from apps.mozillalabs.com.
